name: Velstrac Magic
summary: You know there's so much more to sensation than whips and chains—but whips and chains also have their place.
description:
You know there's so much more to sensation than whips and chains—but whips and chains also have their place. You can cast telekinetic maneuver and web once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells; in both cases, the spells manifest shadowy chains rather than their usual visual signifiers.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
